tests.server_console:
gcc -c -o gfserver.o -Wall -Werror --std=gnu99 -g3 -fsanitize=address -fno-omit-frame-pointer -Wno-format-security gfserver.c
gcc -c -o gfserver_main.o -Wall -Werror --std=gnu99 -g3 -fsanitize=address -fno-omit-frame-pointer -Wno-format-security gfserver_main.c
gcc -o gfserver_main -Wall -Werror --std=gnu99 -g3 -fsanitize=address -fno-omit-frame-pointer -Wno-format-security  gfserver.o handler.o gfserver_main.o content.o -lpthread  -static-libasan
tests.name: Test that the server compiles

tests.server_console:
[request] GETFILE GET /filecorpus/large.bin


Data received. Initiating file transfer.
[status] GF_OK
[return (data sent)] 23
FILE TRANSFER COMPLETE! [handlerCheck] 94207310
tests.name: Test that the server properly sends an OK response and long message (more than 50MB)

tests.server_console:
[request] GETFILE GET /filecorpus/medium.pdf


Data received. Initiating file transfer.
[status] GF_OK
[return (data sent)] 22
FILE TRANSFER COMPLETE! [handlerCheck] 3476419
tests.name: Test that the server properly sends an OK response and medium message in different sized chunks
